text: Carolyn Jones (1941-2018) was an actress active on British TV and movies. She was born in British Columbia. Her major starring roles include: *Crossroads as Sharon Metcalfe, *Key role in The Sweeney Season 1 Episode 2 Jackpot as Irene. == Other websites == * https://www.telegraph.co.uk/obituaries/2018/08/07/carolyn-jones-actress- obituary/ Category:Pages created with the Article Wizard from 2024 Category:1941 births Category:2018 deaths Category:British television actors Category:British radio actors Category:Soap opera actors
title: Carolyn Jones (British actress)
